titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1937 LEDOUX Mme Yvette Ledoux Select Raspail Bd Raspail 10 rue thibaud 14e 1 m 1 v 25 dep 50
Sept 23 Last Chronicles of Barset 2v Oct 27 Oct 27 Crome Yellow Nov 3 Oct 27 Lost girl Nov 3 Nov 3 Water on the Brain Nov 8 Figure of Eight Nov 8 Renewed Oct 23 - Nov 23 1v 25v. (can take 2 at a time)
Nov 8 Narrow Corner Nov 12 Taking of the Gry Nov 12 Nov 12 Jonah's gourd Vine Nov 13 Eggs & Batter Nov 13 13 Ah King Nov 17 13 Captain Margaret Nov 17 17 Not without Laughter Nov. 25 17 The Trespasser. Nov 25 25 As I knew Him Dec. 1 25 The White Peacock Dec 1 Dec 1 Life of Katherine Mansfield Dec 4 1 Not I But the Wind. Dec 4 4 The Garden Party Dec 7 4 Journal Dec 7 7 Personal Record Dec 11 7 Chance Dec 11 11 Poor Relations Dec 15 11 Boy in the Bush Dec 15
Dec 15 Rainbow 97 Dec 27 Dec 15 Darkening green 50 Dec 27 27 Burning Cactus 47 Jan 4 27 Pie in the Sky 1v a day Jan 4 Jan 4 Keep the Aspidistra Flying Jan 6. Renewed Nov 23 1937 - Feb 23 1938 2 vols 100v Jan 4 Armed with Madness Jan 6 Jan 6 Light in August Jan. 10 Jan 6 Ashe of Rings Jan. 10 Jan. 10 Then I saw the Caupo Jan 13 Jan 10 Letters of Gertrude Bell Jan 13 13 Hawbucks Jan. 24 13 On a Chinese Screen Jan. 24. 24 Black Arrow Feb. 1 24 Woman who stole everything Febr. 1 Febr-1 diary Butts Feb. 4 Tobacco Road Feb. 3 Feb. 3 We Europeans Febr. 8 Feb. 3 Green Hills of Africa Febr. 8 Febr-8 Burmese Days. Feb. 10 8 Crime of Duba Feb 10 10 Daughter of the Samurai Febr. 11 10 Tropic of Cancer Febr 11 11 Farewell to Arms Febr 12 11 Thin Man Febr. 12 12. Aviators Febr. 15 12 Tears. Febr. 15 15 Six Queer Things Mar 9 15 Living China 9 owes 7 fr. overdue March 9 Asylum Apr. 21 9 Mules and Men " 21 owes 2 mos 1 v 90v plus 7 97v less 50 dep. 50 owes 47 frs
